maqras.text: Ojo nadidai on kasonro, ki ne'mati Xudoro ʙa kufr ivaz soxtand va mardumi xudro ʙa dijori halok ʙurdand
Ba cahannam, on qarorgohi ʙad, doxil mesavand
Baroi Xudo sarikone qaror dodand, to mardumro az rohi U gumroh sozand. Bigu: «Aknun ʙahramand garded, ki ʙozgastaton ʙa otas ast»

Ba ʙandagoni Man, ki imon ovardaand, ʙigu to namoz ʙiguzorand va az on ci ruziason dodaem, nihonu oskoro sadaqa kunand, pes az on, ki ruze faro rasad, ki dar on na xaridu furuxte ʙosad va na hec dustie ʙa kor ojad

Xudost, ki osmonhovu zaminro ofarid va az osmon ʙoron nozil kard va ʙa on ʙoron ʙaroi ruzii sumo mevaho rujonid va kistihoro romi sumo kard to ʙa farmoni U dar dare ravon savand va rudhoro itoatkunandai sumo soxt
Va oftoʙu mohro, ki hamesa dar harakatand, romi sumo kard va saʙu ruzro farmonʙari sumo gardonid
Va har ci az U xosted, ʙa sumo arzoni dostaast va agar xohed, ki ne'mathojasro sumor kuned, natavoned, dar haqiqat odami sitamkor va kofiri ne'mat ast
Va Iʙrohim guft: «Ej Parvardigori man, in sarzaminro tinc gardon va marovu farzandonamro az parastisi ʙuton dur ʙidor
Ej Parvardigori man, inho ʙisjore az mardumro gumroh kardaand, pas har kas, ki az man pajravi kunad, az man ast va har kas farmoni man naʙarad, tu omurzandavu mehruʙoni

Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa'ze az farzandonamro ʙa vodii ʙe hec kistae, nazdiki xonai giromii tu coj dodam, ej Parvardigori mo, to namoz ʙiguzorand. Dilhoi mardumon cunon kun, ki majli onho kunand va az har mevae ruziason deh, sojad, ki sipos guzorand
Ej Parvardigori mo, har ciro pinhon medorem, jo oskor mesozem, Tu ʙa on ogohi. Va ʙar Xudo hec ciz dar zaminu osmon pusida nest
Sipos Xudoero, ki dar in piri Ismoilu Ishoqro ʙa man ato kard. Parvardigori man du'ohoro mesunavad
Ej Parvardigori man, maro va farzandoni maro ʙarpojdorandagoni namoz gardon. Ej Parvardigori mo, du'oi maro ʙipazir
Ej Parvardigori mo, maro va padaru modaram va hamai mu'minonro dar ruzi sumor ʙiʙaxsoi!»
Va napindor, ki Xudo az kirdori sitamkoron ƣofil ast. Azoʙasonro to on ruz, ki casmho dar on xira memonad, ʙa der mepartojad
Mesitoʙand, sarhoro ʙolo giriftaand, casm ʙar ham namezanand va dilhojason xoli az xirad ast

Mardumro az on ruz, ki azoʙ faro merasad, ʙitarson. Sitamkoron megujand: «Bor Xudojo, moro andake muhlat dex, to da'vati Turo icoʙat kunem va ʙa pajomʙaronn Tu pajravi kunem». Ojo sumo pes az in savgand namexurded, ki hargiz zavol namejoʙed? (namemired)
Dar xonahoi kasone, ki xud ʙar xud sitam mekardand, coj girifted va donisted ʙo onon ci guna raftor kardem va ʙarojaton misolho ovardem
Onon najranghoi xud namudand va Xudo az najranghojason ogoh ʙud. Harcand, ki az najranghojasor kuh az poj meaftod
Mapindor, ki Xudo va'daero, ki ʙa pajomʙaronas dodaast, xilof mekunad. Xudovand piruzmand va intiqomgiranda ast
On ruz, ki zamin ʙa zamine ƣajri in zamin muʙaddal savad va osmonho ʙa osmone digar va hama dar pesgohi Xudoi vohidi qahhor hozir ojand
Gunahkoronro dar on ruz ʙa ƣulhoe, ki dastro ʙa gardan ʙandand, ʙasta ʙuʙini
Comahoson az qatron ast va otas rujhojasonro pusidaast
To Xudo har kasro ʙaroʙari amalas cazo dihad, alʙatta Xudo zudhisoʙkunanda ast
In pajomest ʙaroi mardum to ʙa on ʙimnok savand va ʙidonand, ki Ust Xudoi jakto va to xiradmandon pand girand
